title: Not seeing rune pages in the shop
body: Ttile.  This is legacy client btw, so help?

replies.body: The rune pages are currently hiding in the store.  When you go to the rune section of the store, look over the left panel and switch Show Tier 3 to Show All.  Hope that helps!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=OOgusKym,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-20T00:52:32.384+0000)
>
> The rune pages are currently hiding in the store.  When you go to the rune section of the store, look over the left panel and switch Show Tier 3 to Show All.  Hope that helps!

Maybe you guys should consider creating some more clarity for this issue? It's almost everyday I see a post about them. Imagine all those people that don't actually use the forums that are possibly at a loss?
I think you should change this on the new client unless your planning on reworking runes soon.
